text: Chuck Weyant (April 3, 1923 - January 24, 2017) was an American racecar driver. He competed in 1955, 1957, 1958 and 1959 Indianapolis 500 races. Until his death, Weyant was the oldest living Indianapolis 500 veteran. He was born in St. Marys, Ohio. Weyant died on January 24, 2017 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Ohio
title: Chuck Weyant
